practice_phrases: I would have been ready.
我会准备好。
I would have been ready then.
我当时会准备好。
I would have been ready to wait.
我会准备好等待。
I would have been ready to help.
我会准备好帮助。
I would have been ready at the time.
我那时会准备好。
I would have been ready to do different things.
我会准备好做不同的事。
I would have been ready to stay with her.
我会准备好和她住在一起。
I would have been ready if you'd told me.
如果你告诉我我会准备好。
I would have been ready to talk about how it all started.
我会准备好谈论这一切是如何开始的。
I would have been ready to do the sensible thing in the first place.
我会准备好最初做明智的事。
To look somewhere else.
去别的地方看看。
I need to look somewhere else.
我需要去别的地方看看。
We have to look somewhere else.
我们要去别的地方看看。
He needs to look somewhere else.
他需要去别的地方看看。
To look somewhere else for help.
去别的地方看看找帮助。
I would have been ready to look somewhere else.
我会准备好去别的地方看看。
We need to look somewhere else at the time.
我们那时需要去别的地方看看。
She offered to look somewhere else with us.
她提出和我们去别的地方看看。
I'd have known to look somewhere else if you'd told me.
如果你告诉我我会知道去别的地方看看。
We were talking about how we need to look somewhere else to live.
我们在谈论我们如何需要去别的地方看看住。
Somewhere else.
别的地方。
I went somewhere else.
我去了别的地方。
To stay somewhere else.
住在别的地方。
We need somewhere else to live.
我们需要别的地方住。
He needs to look somewhere else.
他需要去别的地方看看。
I would have been ready somewhere else.
我会在别的地方准备好。
We didn't have anywhere to live somewhere else.
我们没有地方在别的地方住。
She offered to let us stay somewhere else.
她提出让我们住在别的地方。
I would have been ready to look somewhere else at the time.
我那时会准备好去别的地方看看。
We were talking about how we need to look for work somewhere else.
我们在谈论我们如何需要在别的地方找工作。
To have a look.
看看。
I want to have a look.
我想看看。
We need to have a look.
我们需要看看。
He needs to have a look.
他需要看看。
To have a look somewhere else.
去别的地方看看。
I would have been ready to have a look.
我会准备好看看。
She offered to have a look at the time.
她那时提出看看。
We need to have a look at how it all started.
我们需要看看这一切是如何开始的。
I'd have been ready to have a look if you'd told me then.
如果你当时告诉我我会准备好看看。
I would have been ready to look somewhere else.
我会准备好去别的地方看看。
